commit.message:
re PR middle-end/68595 (ice in const_vector_mask_from_tree at expr.c:11455)

gcc/

	PR middle-end/68595
	* tree-vect-stmts.c (vect_init_vector): Cast boolean
	scalars to a proper value before building a vector.

gcc/testsuite/

	PR middle-end/68595
	* gcc.dg/pr68595.c: New test.

From-SVN: r231106
